name: My Singing Monsters: Guide
description:
Ever wondered how to breed a Ghazt? Or how many Coins an adult Furcorn produces on Space Island? How about how to wake up the Wublins? This is the app for you! My Singing Monsters: Official Guide is the comprehensive companion to My Singing Monsters and My Singing Monsters: Dawn of Fire. Join the ranks of the Monster-Handlers and learn the secrets of the Monster World, all in one handy, easy-to-use place.

Features:

• An interactive guide for EVERY known species of Singing Monster
• BREEDING combinations for Special Monsters… officially revealed for the first time!
• Checklist and FAVORITE toggles for the Monster pages you use the most
• Crafting recipes for COLLECTIBLE items in the world of Dawn of Fire
• And more!

Happy Monstering!

______
PLEASE support the Monster-Handlers by rating the game after you update!

Come sing with us. Join the My Singing Monsters community:
Facebook (Facebook.com/mysingingmonsters)
Twitter (Twitter.com/singingmonsters)
YouTube (YouTube.com/mysingingmonsters)

HELP & SUPPORT: Get a hold of the Monster-Handlers by visiting www.bigbluebubble.com/support or contacting us in the app by going to Options > Support.
